Waltham.Belmont Center (MBTA station): Belmont Center is a commuter rail station on the MBTA Commuter Rail Fitchburg Line located in Belmont, Massachusetts. It is situated at the intersection of Common Street, Concord Avenue, and Leonard Street adjacent to Belmont's town center. It is one of two railroad stations located in Belmont, the other being Waverley station located in Waverley Square.
